alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 12:14AM MST until September 13 at 12:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MST FOR COCONINO AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES... At 1213 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Rimrock, or 14 miles east of Camp Verde, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino and Yavapai Counties. This includes State Route 260 between mile markers 235 and 237, and between mile markers 240 and 243. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
